Title: Requires municipal corporations to reimburse residents for the justifiable maintenance of publicly owned areas
Summary: Requires municipal corporations to reimburse residents in whole or in part for justifiable maintenance, such as snow removal and the removal of debris, of publicly owned areas.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring municipal corporations to reimburse residents for the justifiable maintenance of publicly owned areas
